content.question: A solid sphere, a hollow sphere, and a ring all have the same mass and radius. Each is released from rest at the top of the same incline and rolls without slipping down the incline. Which of the following indicates the object that will reach the bottom of the incline first and provides correct reasoning?

choices.label: The ring, because it has the greatest rotational inertia.
The ring, because it has the smallest rotational inertia.
The hollow sphere, because it has the greatest rotational inertia.
The solid sphere, because it has the greatest rotational inertia.
The solid sphere, because it has the smallest rotational inertia.

content.answer: The solid sphere, because it has the smallest rotational inertia.
